code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectDetailReducer=function selectDetailReducer(state){return state.detail;};export var selectIsLoading=createSelector(selectDetailReducer,function(state){return state.isLoading;});export var selectDetail=createSelector(selectDetailReducer,function(state){return state.detail;});export var selectError=createSelector(selectDetailReducer,function(state){return state.error;});export var selectCounter=createSelector(selectDetailReducer,function(state){return state.counter;});export var selectProducts=createSelector(selectDetailReducer,function(state){return state.products;});
